verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:1
verses.text: This is the third time I am coming to you. In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:2
verses.text: I told you before, and foretell you, as if I were present, the second time; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned, and to all other, that, if I come again, I will not spare:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:3
verses.text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me, which to you-ward is not weak, but is mighty in you.
